title: Mutagenic fog
data:
{{version029}}

'''Mutagenic fog''' is a dangerous kind of [[cloud]], a condensed form of [[magical contamination]]. Ending a turn standing within a mutagenic fog cloud will give your character 1300-2500 points of contamination, quickly reaching dangerous levels if you spend significant amounts of time in one. Monsters will [[polymorph]] instead, occasionally becoming a higher [[HD]] creature than they were before.

Mutagenic fog is thankfully very rare, usually found in [[vault]]s in [[the Abyss]] and [[Cigotuvi's Fleshworks]] or emitted if you worship [[Xom]] and he thinks this place needs a bit more athmosphere.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.15]], mutagenic fog inflicted [[bad mutation]]s on the player each turn, rather than giving them magical contamination.
*Mutagenic fog was added in [[0.8]].
